item.title: CVE-2024-25559|2024-02-15T04:32:37.608Z -- appleple inc. -- a-blog cms
item.description: URL spoofing vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.0 to Ver.3.1.8. If an attacker sends a specially crafted request, the administrator of the product may be forced to access an arbitrary website when clicking a link in the audit log.
